pullrequest.title: Add unit tests for model editor classes

content.raw:
[build fails on homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/613/)

~~~
Undefined symbols for architecture x86_64:
  "gazebo::gui::GraphScene::RemoveEdge(std::__1::basic_string<char, std::__1::char_traits<char>, std::__1::allocator<char> > const&)", referenced from:
      GraphScene_TEST::EdgeUpdates() in GraphScene_TEST.cc.o
  "gazebo::gui::GraphScene::RemoveNode(std::__1::basic_string<char, std::__1::char_traits<char>, std::__1::allocator<char> > const&)", referenced from:
      GraphScene_TEST::NodeUpdates() in GraphScene_TEST.cc.o
  "gazebo::gui::GraphScene::SetEdgeColor(std::__1::basic_string<char, std::__1::char_traits<char>, std::__1::allocator<char> > const&, gazebo::common::Color const&)", referenced from:
      GraphScene_TEST::EdgeColor() in GraphScene_TEST.cc.o
  "gazebo::gui::GraphScene::AddEdge(std::__1::basic_string<char, std::__1::char_traits<char>, std::__1::allocator<char> > const&, std::__1::basic_string<char, std::__1::char_traits<char>, std::__1::allocator<char> > const&, std::__1::basic_string<char, std::__1::char_traits<char>, std::__1::allocator<char> > const&)", referenced from:
      GraphScene_TEST::EdgeUpdates() in GraphScene_TEST.cc.o
      GraphScene_TEST::EdgeColor() in GraphScene_TEST.cc.o
...
  "QGVScene::~QGVScene()", referenced from:
      GraphScene_TEST::NodeUpdates() in GraphScene_TEST.cc.o
      GraphScene_TEST::EdgeUpdates() in GraphScene_TEST.cc.o
      GraphScene_TEST::EdgeColor() in GraphScene_TEST.cc.o
  "QGVEdge::color() const", referenced from:
      GraphScene_TEST::EdgeColor() in GraphScene_TEST.cc.o
ld: symbol(s) not found for architecture x86_64
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
make[2]: *** [gazebo/gui/model/UNIT_GraphScene_TEST] Error 1
~~~

Maybe an issue with optional dependencies?
